# <a name="add-a-holiday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="e6121-102">Outlook.com で休日の予定表を追加する</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e6121-102">Add a holiday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e6121-103">ページの下部にある予定表アイコンを選択し、</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e6121-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon.</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e6121-104">[[予定表] に移動](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar)します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e6121-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e6121-105">左側のウィンドウで、**[予定表の追加]** > **[趣味の予定表]** > **[休日]** の順に選択します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e6121-105">In the left pane, select **Add calendar** > **Interesting Calendars** > **Holidays**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="e6121-106">必要な休日の予定表を選択し、一番上の隅で **[X]** を選択して選択を保存し、**[予定表の追加]** ウィンドウを閉じます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e6121-106">Select the holiday calendar you want and then select **X** in the top corner to save your choice and close the **Add calendar** window.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e6121-107">詳細については、「[誕生日や休日の予定表を追加する](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)」を参照してください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e6121-107">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
